page.title: 11AVENING:SUPERMARKETS & SHOPS
page.content: The three shops in{Avening}are all in the block. Most important of all is the Post Office which is also a supermarket selling groceries, confectionery and vegetables.It also deals in the hardware{TRADE.}At the upper end of the High Street is a newsagents that is also a Building Society.This shop sells sweets, stationery and tobacco, as well as newspapers. Over the road is another supermarket selling only food.These three shops give{EMPLOYMENT}to seven full-time staff and two part-time staff. All these shops serve the local area; however the postmaster mentioned the benefit from{TOURISM.}With the motor car so much a part of peoples' {LIFE STYLES,}most people interviewed said that they depended on fairly frequent "shopping trips" to places like Stroud and Cirencester.
